channel.title: Swedish Tech Events (Stockholm)
channel.description: Events for developers, technologists, and other geeks in Sweden

item.title: 2021-12-01 18:00 SvelteSummit Mini Edition: Stockholm - Svelte Society Stockholm
item.description: Here we go! The first mini Svelte Summit event. Featuring a bunch of interesting talks, both live and pre-recorded! Come hang out, have some beers and eat some pizza! Note: attending here means you're attending the live event! If you're just going to watch online on You...

item.title: 2021-11-25 19:00 Swedish Power BI Usergroup October Meetup - Swedish Power BI User Group
item.description: It's time for the November meetup! This one is also in person, and for the second time this year we get to use the amazing Reactor space for our meetup. This event is back to the customary Thursday. I've managed to convince Kurt Buhler to come back and share the latest ...

item.title: 2021-11-26 08:00 Cloudburst Conference - Microsoft Reactor Stockholm
item.description: CloudBurst 2021 is a Microsoft Azure developer conferences in run by local enthusiasts. The idea is full days of Azure related sessions in one single session room. You will not miss anything with multiple tracks. Presenters are Microsoft Azure community & industry leaders ...

item.description: A warm welcome to this year's first physical meetup in the Stockholm Cloud Computing meetup group. We have really been looking forward to seeing you all again. We will start with some conversation while we enjoy some tasty local beer and some light food (non alcoholic a...

item.title: 2021-12-01 17:00 Jfokus Foo Bar Christmas edition - Jforum Stockholm

item.title: 2021-11-18 16:00 Lecture: Bitcoin as censor resistant money with Kalle Rosenbaum - Kryptostudenter Stockholm (Crypto Students Stockholm)
item.description: [ENGLISH] Kryptostudenter Stockholm invites you to a lecture with Swedish bitcoin expert Kalle Rosenbaum. In his talk, Kalle will focus on Bitcoin as a censorship resistant money, why censorship resistance is important, and how Bitcoin accomplishes this, followed by a Q&A-...
